name: Keep Shooting
description:
Inspired by the 'hacking minigame' from Nier:Automata comes 'Keep Shooting'.

 Using your mouse and AWSD(or arrow) keys, aim and shoot at your enemy. But as you keep defeating more, greater challenges appear! How long can you last?

Comment your high score, play experience or report nasty bugs !

It is highly recommended to use AWSD keys and a separate mouse device instead of a keyboard mouse pad. Please use full screen when playing for better control of mouse aiming.

Music credit: https://soundcloud.com/xaxattax 'aigis'
